name: Lac16
tagline: Planning tool for the Linux Audio Conference 2016 in Berlin
body:
Linux Audio Conference 2016
===========================

Welcome to the [Linux Audio Conference](http://lac.linuxaudio.org) (`LAC`) 2016 Github page. Here you'll find some information on the current planning status of the conference, which will take place in Berlin.

Head over to the [issue tracker](https://github.com/linux-audio-berlin/LAC16/issues) to help us solve all things concerning the LAC2016. 

Or join **\#lac2016** on [freenode](https://freenode.net/) or use [Freenode's webchat client](http://webchat.freenode.net/?randomnick=1&channels=lac2016&uio=d4), to contact us directly over IRC.

Bi-weekly meetings take place at [c-base](http://c-base.org), as part of the [Linux Audio Users Group Berlin](http://linuxaudio.berlin).
 
We also run a mailing list, to which you can [subscribe](http://linuxaudio.berlin/mailman/listinfo/discuss).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
